title: Rock Paper Scissors Ethers
description: This repository is front-end that enables to play rock-paper-scissors betting player's ethers. I learned solidity development and front-end integration with this repository. You can also check live demo on link.

title: PortFolio Page
description: This is project now you are watching on. I wanted to know what is nextjs, I reallized diffrence between SSR, CSR. And I didn't use design frameworks, since I felt I need to get used to use pure css before I adaping them.
